name: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg
name_original: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg
description:
Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg is an arcade game developed by Sonic Team. It was originally released in 2006. SEGA published the game.
Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg is available on PC.
It was produced by Yuji Naka. It was directed by Shun Nakamura. Mariko Nanba and Tomoya Ohtani scored the game.
